nodes.text: A male Amani bartender worked on the Crimson Redrum, one of the barrooms of the Quarek'k, a large bar complex located on Coruscant shortly after the rise of the Galactic Empire.

In 19 BBY, the bounty hunter Aurra Sing visited the bar, searching for information regarding the former Jedi Jax Pavan. Sing sought help from the Crimson Redrum bartender, who then directed her to his colleague Calathi, a bartender working on the Green Dystopia, another barroom of the Quarek'k.
